meanings.definition: relating or restricted to a particular area or neighborhood
meanings.sent1: The local bakery is just around the corner.
meanings.sent2: I always support local businesses in my community.
meanings.sent3: The local squirrel stole my sandwich and ran up a tree!
meanings.sent4: Her local knowledge of the hiking trails was invaluable.
meanings.sent5: The local farmers market is a vibrant hub of activity.

meanings.definition: a person or thing belonging to or associated with a particular area
meanings.sent1: The locals gathered at the town hall for a meeting.
meanings.sent2: She is a true local, born and raised in this town.
meanings.sent3: The local cat is always napping in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The local hero saved the day with his quick thinking.
meanings.sent5: The locals welcomed the new family with open arms.

meanings.definition: a train or bus that stops at all stations or stops on a route
meanings.sent1: I prefer taking the local train for short trips.
meanings.sent2: The local bus arrived right on time at the stop.
meanings.sent3: The local bus driver greeted each passenger with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The local train chugged along the tracks, stopping frequently.
meanings.sent5: The local bus route is perfect for exploring the city.
